messages.message:
Wanted to share start of week updates on team automate's side, below are all the tasks required for the above goal and their status:
• :white_check_mark: Add derived/udf field + clean line running to app runs
• :white_check_mark: Add conditional split-class vs non-split-class running to app runs
• :white_check_mark: Add validation steps to app runs
• :white_check_mark: Add case management steps to app runs
• :loading_wheel: Support ground truth set creation and accuracy report running with flash
    ◦ :white_check_mark: BE changes merged to support gt sets from flash app runs
    ◦ :loading_wheel: BE changes for running accuracy reps with flash
    ◦ :loading_wheel: need FE toggle to create gt sets with flash run, BE reads from setting
For getting Build and gemini to work + any other tasks:
• :white_check_mark: FE for auto-generating schemas
• :white_check_mark: split-class/classification api's done
• :loading_wheel: FE toggle to turn gemini classification on + off
    ◦ BE use project setting
• :loading_wheel: extraction api
• FE changes to call any new apis and use returned extracted fields from classification apis
